name: Oestreicher 2045
description:
Move with ARROW keys or WASD

Shoot with SPACEBAR or Z key

ESC key = quit

This game was made for the Giant Rom 5 game jam. Project was made using Gamemaker Studio 2. 

Take control of Jason and Griffin Oestreicher and save the day to allow Giantbomb's anniversary stream to go on! 

Made by: Paul Turnbach
